Content: bugs and crashes! could be more stable, alot more

the application is good for controlling the applications you want to use and it gives you control over the applications you want to restrict. Two problems. the time usage numbers are not correct. it looks like sometimes the app is just making numbers up!! second it keeps crashing now and again. this needs to be fixed pronto.

I like this app better than Thrive. It's much easier for me to use and doesn't crash hardly at all on my phone so far (Thrive ALWAYS crashed on me, to the point of barely functioning when it ran). I love how it compares my phone use to that of average users as well. Just after one week I know I've already saved myself from many hours of stressful newsfeed reading in this disgusting political era. Hooray!
Hi, the app seems to have compatibility issues with my Xiaomi mi5s. Crashes after setting age and gender. App looked interesting on the news.
